posts.title: Underwater Puppies Photography Book
posts.content: Fall in love day after day with the Underwater Puppies Photography book. As far as coffee table books go, this amusing hardcover contains page after page of impossibly cute puppies swimming underwater that’ll brighten up anyone’s day and make them go awww.

posts.title: Luchador Wrestler Bottle Opener
posts.content: Fans of Mexican wrestling and heavy drinking are in for a real treat with the wrestler headlock bottle opener. This mighty warrior from south of the border comes dressed from head to toe in his battle suit, ready to pop open beer bottles with the signature headlock.

posts.title: Water Drop Solar String Lights
posts.content: Take your patio’s nighttime ambiance from dull to magical by illuminating it using these water drop solar string lights. These waterproof lights can run for 8 hours on a single charge and offer both a steady and flashing mode to create amazing effects.

posts.title: Donut Coffee Mug
posts.content: Nothing goes together better than coffee and donuts — put these two delicious breakfast treats in one place with the donut coffee mug. This mug looks like that sprinkly donut you just took a bite out of, and it holds the refreshing and essential caffeinated beverage.

posts.title: Suspend Hanging Balance Game
posts.content: Have everyone at the game table on the edge of their seats the entire night by playing the Suspend hanging balance game. Players take turn hanging the notched, rubber-tipped wire pieces from the tabletop stand onto the main structure without knocking it down.

posts.title: Odor Removing Bar
posts.content: Keep your hands from smelling like servitude after dealing with smelly ingredients by using the odor removing bar. Simply rub the re-usable bar over your bare hands after working with odorous foods such as garlic and onions to properly eliminate the smell.

posts.title: Ninja Mug
posts.content: Get ready to combat the day ahead of you by energizing yourself with your favorite caffeinated beverage served out of the ninja mug. It features a removable hood koozie, a built-in ninja star coaster, and a deadly stirring sword.

posts.title: Mesh Car/Trunk Organizer
posts.content: Keep your vehicle looking spick-and-span at all times with help from this mesh car/trunk organizer. Available in black or beige, it’s designed to mount easily to your car’s headrest and is crafted from a reinforced mesh that make it ideal for holding heavy objects.

posts.title: LED Light Show Portable DJ Mixer
posts.content: Instantly get the party started by overloading everyone’s senses with this LED light show portable DJ mixer. This all-in-one party essential provides crisp sound, stunning visuals, and comes with a built-in 6 hour rechargeable battery.

posts.title: Runny Nose Yolk Separator
posts.content: The runny nose yolk separator lets you make some delicious and healthy egg white omelettes while grossing out everyone around you. Once the eggs are poured into the pot, the yolk gets safely separated while the egg white drips out the nose like snot.

posts.title: GoPro Mounted Quadrocopter
posts.content: Get incredible action shots of your unsuspecting neighbors going about their daily activities by invading their privacy with the GoPro mounted quadrocopter. It offers easy maneuverability and features extreme camera stability for smooth video recording.

posts.title: Transformers 3D Wall Night Light
posts.content: Scare away all things that go bump in the night by placing the Transformers 3D wall night light on the job. The creatively designed night light emits a cool red glow from the edges while making it appear as if the Autobots have crash landed through your wall.
